scenes.description: A slideshow of fan messages and illustrations for Mori Calliope's 2nd Concert 'Grimoire' is displayed.
An official announcement graphic stating the concert will start soon.
A notice for visitors detailing rules about flashing lights and cheering.
A showcase of the second round of concert merchandise.
The slideshow of fan messages continues with additional notes and artwork.

subtitles.original:
The concert will be starting soon.
開演までもうしばらくお待ちください。
subtitles.english:
The concert will be starting soon.
Please wait a while longer for the performance to begin.

subtitles.original:
Please be aware of flashing lights during the performance.
演出の都合上、照明の点滅にご注意ください
subtitles.english:
Please be aware of flashing lights during the performance.
Due to the production, please be careful of flashing lights.

subtitles.original:
Cheering loudly is OK
声出しの応援 OK です
subtitles.english:
Cheering loudly is OK
Cheering with your voice is permitted.

subtitles.original:
Mori Calliope 2nd Concert "Grimoire"
2nd Round of Concert Merch
subtitles.english:
Mori Calliope 2nd Concert "Grimoire"
2nd Round of Concert Merch

subtitles.original: Essentials Pack / Glow Stick / Towel / Lanyard / T-shirt
subtitles.english: Essentials Pack / Glow Stick / Towel / Lanyard / T-shirt

subtitles.original: Coin Case / Acrylic Panel / Rubber Mat / Key Chain
subtitles.english: Coin Case / Acrylic Panel / Rubber Mat / Key Chain
